amendment.description: An amendment numbered 72 printed in House Report 115-830 to increase funding for the Community Development Financial Institutions (CDFI) Fund Account by $2 million and allocates the increase to the Native American CDFI Assistance (NACA) Program. Offsets the increase by decreasing funding for GSA rental space by $2 million.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Young (AK) amendment (A066) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A066) offered by Mr. Young (AK).
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Young (AK) amendment (A066) Agreed to by voice vote.
